content: With overall advertising revenue seeing a year-over-year increase of 116%, it’s Vizio ads platform has grown into a mock app for brand and entertainment marketers who have seen the number of the right advertising clients grow. Operator, we’ll take the next question. Operator, we’ll take the next question. Operator, we’ll take the next question. Operator, we’ll take the next question. And I think as our partners continue to grow, as we bring more eyeballs to SmartCast and Time spent as well as active user grows, we think there’s going to be a lot of opportunities for us to continue to drive not only viewership or subscriptions for our partners, help them reduce churn, but also continue to increase monetization for our most monetizable opportunities, which includes WatchFree+. Operator, we’ll take the next question. We are confident that we’re going to be able to grow our shipments this year over last year, and that will – I don’t know if it’ll be exactly steadily up throughout every single quarter, but absolutely moving in that direction with a lot of strength because of the strong position we have right now with available product in the channels and the pricing strategies we’ve deployed, we feel good about both shipments and then obviously sell through and how that starts to feed into Active Account growth as I talked about earlier. Operator, we’ll take the next question.
